title: Video: PINS – Say To Me
body:
Manchester is exciting; the kids in London are still furiously masturbating to bros wearing crudely screen-printed upside-down cross tees, while Manchester simply doesn’t give a fuck.

Manchester is happy just being Manchester, eclectic, forward thinking and exciting. Step forward **[PINS](https://www.facebook.com/wearepins)**, a four piece we’ve been excited about for a little while now. The band nestles rather comfortably between **Kult Country** and London’s **Savages** when it comes to the groups’ contemporaries. Not only do the band settle in, they also manage to excel. The new video for _Say To Me_, taken from [**PINS**‘](https://www.facebook.com/wearepins) debut EP _LUVU4LYF_**,** is a dramatic, yet perhaps slightly queasy, visual interpretation of the track. It’s demanding, uncompromising and assuming.

Assume you’ll be hearing a lot more from this lot and buy the EP [here.](http://bellaunion.sandbag.uk.com/Store/DII-10396-10-pins++luvu4lyf+ep+preorder.html)

[PINS – SAY TO ME](http://vimeo.com/51077709) from [PINS](http://vimeo.com/user10270525) on [Vimeo](http://vimeo.com).
